import React, { useContext,useState,useEffect } from 'react' import { ApiContext } from '../../context/ApiContext' // import UsersContext from "../store/users-context"; const standing= ({playerStatistics}) => { return (
{playerStatistics.map((data , index) => ( ))}
# Team Name Goals Expected Goals (XG) Succ. dribbles Tackles Assists Accurate passes % Rating
{index+1} {data.playerName} {data.goals} {data.expectedgoals} {data.successfulDribbles} {data.tackles} {data.assists} {Math.round(data.accuratePassesPercentage).toFixed(2)} {Math.round(data.Rating).toFixed(2)}
); }; export default standing;
